meanings.definition: A growling sound made by an animal, typically a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dog's loud grr scared away the cat.
meanings.sent2: I heard a grr coming from the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The grr of the puppy was more cute than scary.
meanings.sent4: The grr of the thunderstorm echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The grr of the lion sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: An expression of anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Grr! I can't find my keys anywhere.
meanings.sent2: She let out a loud grr when she realized she missed the bus.
meanings.sent3: Grr, why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent4: His grr of annoyance filled the room.
meanings.sent5: With a grr, he slammed the door shut in anger.
